control_attributes.control_description: The information system restricts the ability of individuals to launch [Assignment: organization-defined denial of service attacks] against other information systems.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system routes [Assignment: organization-defined internal communications traffic] to [Assignment: organization-defined external networks] through authenticated proxy servers at managed interfaces.

Control Statement: The information system restricts the ability of individuals to launch [Assignment: organization-defined denial of service attacks] against other information systems.
